Dune::Amg::FirstDiagonal

Dune::Amg::FirstDiagonal Class Reference
[Parallel Algebraic Multigrid]

#include <aggregates.hh>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Norm that uses only the [0][0] entry of the block to determine couplings.
